name: ChainNewsDAO
description:
The shutdown of ChainNews, the leading blockchain media in Chinese is a great loss for the Chinese crypto community. In order to overcome the information gap and language barrier, we have to have a new ChainNews, which is ChainNewsDAO.

By the principle of decentralization, ChainNewsDAO would not be re-organized as a China-based company, but a purely DAO organization focusing on content with good quality. ChainNewsDAO would organize a team of volunteers finding, translating and spreading articles. 

Moreover, ChainNewsDAO would cooperate with reseacch institute, media, KOL, communities to demonstrate and produce good content in time.

By holding token of ChainNewsDAO ($NEWS), holders would be eligible to view the newest content on the website of ChinaNewsDAO.

Contributors at Juicebox for ChainNewsDAO would be eligible for the airdrop of NFT issued by ChainNewsDAO soon.
payDisclosure: Thanks for your support. For ChainNews.
